Equitalia Practices

Complete solutions for all Equitalia practices

Home > Services > Equitalia Practices

Administrative practice agencies in Milan, including Acentro Services, offer various services related to Equitalia. Acentro Services provides support for managing formalities and compliance with public administration entities.

Here is a detailed list of services offered for Equitalia:

Equitalia Services

Tax Collection

Complete assistance for managing tax collection procedures with Equitalia.

Installment Plan Request Preparation and Submission

Support in preparing and submitting installment plan requests for tax bills.

Tax Bill Payment

Assistance with tax bill payments and verification of correct debt settlement.

Various Pending Charges Verification

Complete check of debt position at Equitalia and analysis of any pending charges.

Tax Bill Duplicate Printing

Support in obtaining duplicates of lost or unreceived tax bills.

Related Digital Services

Acentro Services also offers digital services such as Digital Signature and Certified Email (PEC), which are useful tools for simplifying operational processes related to communication with Equitalia.

DIGIPRAM: The Management Software for Administrative Practices

Additionally, Acentro Services provides DIGIPRAM, a management software designed for administrative practice agencies, which facilitates practice management and offers features such as document management.

Need assistance with your Equitalia practices?

Contact us for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you simplify the management of your tax bills.

Request Information

Fast and efficient solutions for businesses and professionals since 1986.
